short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reopen the pinned tab if closed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By default in chrome, pinned tabs can be closed by pressing ctrl+W.
This is undesirable for those who want to keep pinned tabs.

This extension automatically reopens a tab if a pinned tab is closed. (unpinned tabs are unaffected.)

No need to worry about accidentally closing a pinned tab!
